id.description: The unique identifier for the channel within the system.

external_id.description: The unique identifier for the channel in an external system.

is_listable_from_ui.description: Specifies whether the channel is listable from the user interface.

is_visible.description: Determines if the channel is visible to users.

status.description: The status of the channel (e.g., active, inactive).

type.description: The type of channel (e.g., social media, online marketplace).

platform.description: The platform on which the channel operates.

date_created.description: The date and time when the channel was created.

date_modified.description: The date and time when the channel was last modified.

icon_url.description: The URL pointing to the icon associated with the channel.

is_enabled.description: Indicates whether the channel is currently enabled or disabled.
